channel.title: Doctoral Physics Dissertation at Caltech
channel.description:
Hi there Mopar forums. I am currently in the process of writing my original Thesis for my PhD in Theoretical Particle Physics, and to say the least, it is one of the most challenging things I've had to do in my life. I am writing my thesis based on a new experiment my partner and I have written to try and understand further why light acts as not only a wave, but as a particle as well. Luckily though, we have an amazing Experimental Physics Department here with extremely highly sensitive equipment that is making our actual testing of the Thesis quite trivial.
I just wanted to share a little about what's going on with me, and if anyone else has had to present original work for a Masters or Doctorate, what subject where you working in and what topic did you choose?

item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

xx matty xx:

Never heard of Caltech, is that in chennai? I have eight degrees from Oxford, Cambridge, UCL, ICL, LSE, ICS, ITR, DIK and the University of Leeds. I’m also a distinguished professor at the University of Heriot-Watt, lecturing postgraduates in topics such as advanced ultramorphism and telebionics.

Heriot watt’s a shit hole

item.title: Doctoral Physics Dissertation at Caltech
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

Lol stop trying to flaunt fake intelligence. It’s sickeningly. It seems unlikely some newcomer from moparscape, comes and says he was even a student at cal tech. People at caltech aren’t so egotistical that they post on to every forum that they are from cal tech… Nice try.
Btw, I have undergrads as biomedical masters in prawnsografy, and phd in stripping
Princeton, cooper union and MIT respectively. ( I’m so scared to present my thesis about striping) have any of you done a thesis in stripping?
If so please post em
Cal tech phd genius “where you working on”!!!@$&$&

item.title: Doctoral Physics Dissertation at Caltech
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

I had to go and get my masters in forum administration. I graduated with a 4.0 unweighted GPA but I’ve been having a really hard time getting a job because Tom took the last opening. Now I wait and try to work to get some of that money Moparisthebest is paying just so I can reduce some of my student loan debt…

Read full topic
